Arrangement.text:
VERSE 1: Spirit [C/G]come and shine Your l[G]ight Open [C/G]up these darkened e[G]yes [G/F#]To the [Em]wonders [C]of Your w[G]ord We w[D]ait on [Em]You [C G]
VERSE 2: Spirit [C/G]come and build Your ch[G]urch Till the Go[C/G]spel fills the ea[G]rth [G/F#]And God’s K[Em]ingdom c[C]onquers [G]all We w[D]ait on Y[Em]ou, [C G] we w[D]ait on Y[Em]ou [C G D/F#]
CHORUS: For when You [Em7]move our lives [Cmaj7]are changed We know a t[G]aste of heaven h[D]ere We’re crying [Em7]out to You, O [Cmaj7]Lord For more of Y[G]ou
VERSE 3: Spirit [C/G]come reveal the l[G]ove That the F[C/G]ather has for u[G]s [G/F#]Reass[Em]ure us o[C]nce ag[G]ain We w[D]ait on Y[Em]ou, [C G] we w[D]ait on Y[Em]ou [C G D/F#]
VERSE 4: Spirit [C/G]come exalt the n[G]ame Of our S[C/G]avior in this pl[G]ace [G/F#]May we n[Em]ever b[C]e the s[G]ame We w[D]ait on Y[Em]ou, [C G] we w[D]ait on Y[Em]ou [C G D/F#]
BRIDGE: [Fmaj7] We want to see [G]Jesus, [Fmaj7] we want to know [G]Jesus [Fmaj7] We want to love [G]Jesus, [Fmaj7] to magnify [G]Jesus [(last x C2)]
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 spirit come and shine your light open up these darkened eyes to the wonders of your word we wait on you verse 2 spirit come and build your church till the gospel fills the earth and gods kingdom conquers all we wait on you we wait on you chorus for when you move our lives are changed we know a taste of heaven here were crying out to you o lord for more of you verse 3 spirit come reveal the love that the father has for us reassure us once again we wait on you we wait on you verse 4 spirit come exalt the name of our savior in this place may we never be the same we wait on you we wait on you bridge we want to see jesus we want to know jesus we want to love jesus to magnify jesus
